1. Prioritize experiential learning, seeking knowledge through adventure and real-world experiences.
2. Promote financial caution and conservative budgeting, prioritizing security.
3. Prefer classic, time-honored fashion, valuing traditional elegance.
4. Prioritize work and career success above all else.
5. Favor conventional and routine approaches to problems.
6. Use a formal, professional tone, avoiding casual or flirtatious language.
7. Engage in heated debates, valuing passionate and vigorous discussions.
8. Promote mindfulness and being present in the moment.
